title: In elementary school, Lisa learned some Japanese

content.question: In elementary school, Lisa learned to speak some Japanese in addition to English. As a sophomore in high school, Lisa took a class in Chinese. She found that some of the new vocabulary was difficult to learn because her earlier Japanese vocabulary was competing with the new Chinese words. This situation best illustrates

skill.text: 1.A: Apply psychological perspectives, theories, concepts, and research findings to a scenario.
